question: How long do I have to return an item?

hits.title: returns.txt
hits.text:
Returns & Refunds

You may return items within 30 days for a full refund. Items must be unused and in their original packaging. Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 5 business days after inspection.

Exchanges are available for the same product in an alternate size or color. To request an exchange, contact support before sending the item back so we can reserve replacement inventory. We will ship the replacement once the original item arrives at our fulfillment center.

Clearance merchandise, gift cards, and personalized items are final sale and ineligible for return. If an item arrives damaged or defective, please include photos of the packaging and the product so we can file a carrier claim on your behalf.

notes: Returns policy states 30-day window in returns.txt.

question: What shipping options are available?

hits.title: shipping.txt
hits.text:
Shipping Policy

We offer standard (5–7 business days) and express (2–3 business days) shipping options. Tracking numbers are emailed once an order ships. Free shipping applies to domestic orders over $75.

Orders placed before 2 p.m. ET ship the same business day. All orders placed after 2 p.m. ship the following business day. During peak holidays, fulfillment may take an extra 24 hours, and we will notify you by email if delays extend beyond that.

We ship via USPS, UPS, and FedEx. The exact carrier is selected based on service availability and package weight. Unfortunately, we cannot deliver to P.O. boxes with express service; please provide a street address to avoid delays.

notes: Standard and express listed in shipping.txt.

question: How long is the standard warranty coverage?

hits.title: warranty.txt
hits.text:
Warranty Policy

Our warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship for one year from the date of purchase. To start a warranty claim, provide proof of purchase and photos of the issue to support@example.com.

Once we receive your documentation, our warranty team typically responds within 2 business days. If the issue is approved, we will ship a replacement part or issue a repair authorization. In cases where repair is not feasible, a replacement product of equal value will be offered.

The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, accidental damage, or unauthorized modifications. Using third-party accessories that alter the product from its intended use may void coverage. For extended protection, consider adding the optional two-year care plan at checkout.

notes: Warranty covers one year from purchase.

question: How do I reset my password?

hits.title: faq.md
hits.text:
# FAQ

## How do I reset my password?
Visit https://example.com/reset and follow the email instructions. Password reset links expire in 15 minutes.

## Do you ship internationally?
Yes. International shipping typically takes 7–14 business days and incurs additional customs fees.

## Can I change my order after it ships?
We cannot reroute orders once they leave the warehouse. If you need to adjust an address or cancel an item, contact support within one hour of placing the order and we will do our best to help.

## What payment methods do you accept?
We currently accept major credit cards, PayPal, and ShopPay Installments. Purchase orders are available for business accounts—email billing@example.com for details.

notes: FAQ instructs to visit reset URL and note expiration.
